selected_skills.name: interpret_diagram_for_geometry
selected_skills.purpose: To interpret the geometric properties and relationships in the diagram to assist in calculating the angle ∠AMK.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the image hash to extract geometric information from the diagram.

selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To perform any necessary calculations to determine the angle ∠AMK.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the expression derived from the geometric interpretation to calculate the angle.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as required.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated angle to format the answer as a single line.

new_skill_specs.name: determine_positions_of_points
new_skill_specs.purpose: To determine the positions of points M and K in relation to the square and circle.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A tuple containing the positions of points M and K as strings.
edge_cases: Points M and K are not labeled or are ambiguous in the diagram.

tests.expect: ('M is on the circle', 'K is on the square')
